title: Boy and a boa
creator_credit: Renata Stoia, Lora Hays and Boa Films
brief_description: The story of Martin and his pet boa is informative and entertaining. A story of a young boy and his pet boa. The boa gets loose in a library and gives the viewer a snake’s-eye view of the facilities. We are also learning a great deal about snakes and other members of the reptile family.
